con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-NotRelatableBankTransactions
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests view of not assigned and failed transactions in gui Tests assign not assigned transactions for credit and debit
2017-08-21 - Changed test-case based on implemented us: drc-935: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-935 to assign debit transcation to not registered msisdn from the same tenant must be possible
Updated validation from test-step: 5710N_countFailedBankTransactions-same and followed stepst based on comments from 10.07.18 in https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-883

con:request.name: 5670N_assignCamt05400102Transaction-Credit-NotRegistered
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:assignCamt05400102Transaction>\r <!--type: long-->\r <camt05400102InputEntyId>${#TestCase#Camt054ID-Credit}</camt05400102InputEntyId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <comment>Test-assignment credit to not registered msisdn</comment>\r <assigningValue>\r <msisdn>${#Project#MSISDN-chargeCustomer-OK}</msisdn>\r </assigningValue>\r </v1:assignCamt05400102Transaction>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>Msisdn unknown / not registered</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:fault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime"> <specificFaultType>BUSINESS_ERROR_MSISDN_ISSUE</specificFaultType> <errorMessage>Msisdn unknown / not registered</errorMessage> <errorCode>1001</errorCode> </ns2:fault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: 5690P_assignCamt05400102Transaction-Credit
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:assignCamt05400102Transaction>\r <!--type: long-->\r <camt05400102InputEntyId>${#TestCase#Camt054ID-Credit}</camt05400102InputEntyId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <comment>Test-assignment credit to registered msisdn: ${#TestCase#MSISDN}</comment>\r <assigningValue>\r <msisdn>${#TestCase#MSISDN}</msisdn>\r </assigningValue>\r </v1:assignCamt05400102Transaction>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
